topics.body:
*JESUS!*
I just got the piss scared out of me again(well not literally).

A bit of backstory is that it's no secret that I used to have severe mental problems. . . and I meant severe, but one of the symptoms that I still have scares the living shit out of me and the scary thing is I don't know if it's a symptom.

I'm doing much much better psychologically, but one of the things that scares the shit out of me is that for a couple years I would have episodes where my skull felt like it was on fire and everything go white and a hallucination of a person.  The hallucinations were essentially a split second of seeing someone out of the corner of my eye and when I go look they run off.  It's terrifying if you're alone at night and out of the corner of your eyes see someone.

Before I get any farther I'm doing much better and can no differentiate between reality and fantasy so you don't need to worry.

It's outright astounding that over the last five years I've gone from someone who you couldn't even touch without freaking out and then them proceeding to scratch themselves for the next thirty minutes about feeling wrong that someone touched their skin to someone who has gotten over almost all the trauma and leading a normal life.

Occasionally I still see brief flashes here and there of the hallucination of a person out of the corner of my eyes; the terrifying thing is though whenever it does happen that other people can see the person.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
